scripts.start:all: pnpm run build:shared-ui-library && pnpm install && concurrently "pnpm run start:app-customer" "pnpm run start:app-product" "pnpm run start:app-invoice" "pnpm run start:host"
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:shared-ui-library && pnpm install && concurrently "pnpm run build:app-customer" "pnpm run build:app-product" "pnpm run build:app-invoice" "pnpm run build:host"
scripts.deploy:app-host: pnpm run build:host && firebase deploy --only hosting:app-host
scripts.deploy:app-customer: pnpm run build:app-customer && firebase deploy --only hosting:app-customer-management
scripts.deploy:app-product: pnpm run build:app-product && firebase deploy --only hosting:app-product-management
scripts.deploy:app-invoice: pnpm run build:app-invoice && firebase deploy --only hosting:app-invoice-management
scripts.deploy:all: concurrently "pnpm run deploy:app-customer" "pnpm run deploy:app-product" "pnpm run deploy:app-invoice" && pnpm run deploy:app-host
